name: My Big Brother With Demo
description:
this is a port of a game on a website called gamejolt i wanted to add it here because i felt like it was alright.

story: you play as mark Edwardson who has gone to his dead brothers school to find out what went wrong and put a end to it, but something is going on at the school, you'll see soon.

OK i just wanted to say that this game will be released in chapters sorta like the ink game if you know what i mean. but that is not what i wanted to say i just wanted to say if your game says unknown publisher turn off your screen security. don't worry it will not give you a virus. i swear.

HOW TO USE THE GAME: use the left and right arrow keys to move your character and use the title screen. press the s button to select either the games or all parts. press the Shift Key To Make Your Character Jump. and to use your gun press the space button.

fixed bugs: die from falling Start Button getting an crossbow doors boss fights everything

this is the final beta before the full release if you find any acounts go to one of my two channels: Green-gamer Aka Connor OR Thunder Tornado (A GAME STUDIO) heres one of the links: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzXFv5ZxPik38bOjWI2_ZrQ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLL3LFBHrSA_e8NJYIcESYA?view_as=subscriber

the final alpha before the full game, on halloween if you guys see any bugs report them to me and i'll try to fix them in the final game.

this game is complete, and the full game will be out on halloween this year.

Check Out the Original page: https://gamejolt.com/games/MyBigBrother/343134
